name: Timelapse
description: Your friend Professor Nichols has gone missing. Armed with the archeologist's journal you set out on a journey that will take you to places - and times - you haven't even dreamt of.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows: XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 1.8 GHz Processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 9 Storage: 1500 MB available space
